thread.title: Manchester United outcast Memphis Depay could complete Lyon move in the next 48 hours
thread.title_full: Manchester United outcast Memphis Depay could complete Lyon move in the next 48 hours

author: David McDonnell
title: Manchester United outcast Memphis Depay could complete Lyon move in the next 48 hours
text:
Sport Manchester United outcast Memphis Depay could complete Lyon move in the next 48 hours The French side have improved their £13million bid for the Dutch winger and United are ready to let him go Share Depay is nearing the exit door at Old Trafford (Photo: Man Utd via Getty Images) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Memphis Depay could complete his move from Manchester United to Lyon within the next 48 hours. 
United rejected a £13million bid from Lyon for Memphis, 22, who moved to Old Trafford from PSV Eindhoven for £25m in 2015. 
But it is understood Lyon have returned with an improved bid for the Dutch winger, with United ready to do business and offload the winger after just 18 months. 
Memphis has started one game this season, an EFL Cup win at Northampton back in September, and has been told by boss Jose Mourinho he can leave if United receive an acceptable fee. Depay has started once this season (Photo: Man Utd via Getty Images) 
United have already sold Morgan Schneiderlin to Everton for a fee of £20m, potentially rising to £24m, with Memphis set to join him in exiting Old Trafford. 
The Toffees had also been linked with Depay earlier in the January window, but Ronald Koeman appears to have missed out on the 22-year-old, as United move to ensure that Depay goes to a club where he cannot come back to haunt them Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
